lessons.japanese: 文明が進むにつれて、詩は殆ど必然的に衰える。
lessons.english: As civilization advances, poetry almost necessarily declines.

lessons.japanese: 年をとるにつれて記憶力は段々衰える。
lessons.english: As we grow older, our memory becomes weaker.

lessons.japanese: 年をとるにつれて記憶力は段々衰える。
lessons.english: As we grow older, our memory becomes weaker.

lessons.japanese: 文明が進むにつれて、詩は殆ど必然的に衰える。
lessons.english: As civilization advances, poetry almost necessarily declines.

lessons.japanese: 人間は年を取るにつれて、体力が衰える。
lessons.english: As humans age, their physical strength declines.

lessons.japanese: 人間は年を取るにつれて、体力が衰える。
lessons.english: As humans age, their physical strength declines.
